name: Dsa Sorting Visualizer
content: An interactive React tool to visualize and understand sorting algorithms.

name: Text to Speech
content: A React app that converts text into speech using the Web Speech API. Users can input text, select voices, and adjust pitch, speed, and volume.

name: Typing-Speed
content: A React app to test typing speed and accuracy.

name: Google Clone
content: Its a Clone of Google Keep made using React-js
